title: Like She Is In Him: Selected Work from A Troublemaking Eco-feminist Punk
features: A collection of poems from previously published works and two essays by an eco-feminist, boat rocking, lover of Gaia and all of life.
description: River Smith is a poet and progressive, eco-feminist activist, who uses the spoken and written word to contribute to a revolution of love. As a teacher, alternative video producer, recording artist, and psychologist he advocates for economic and social justice.
